short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use OpenAI to summarize, ask questions, and explain text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make a OpenAI models work with web page text for you.

1Ô∏è‚É£ You'll need OpenAI api key. Here is link to obtain it: https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Select text.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Choose "OpenAI API Explorer - TextAigist" -> "Summarize" or any other option, like "Answer the question" (if the the question is selected). Or even ask your own question about selected text with "Ask question about selected text" menu item.
‚ùáÔ∏è See summary from OpenAI model as popup window.

Features:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Pick one of many OpenAI models available
‚ÑπÔ∏è Ask model anything about selected text like, in this case selected text is the context for the answer
‚ÑπÔ∏è Create custom menu item to ask your own questions about selected text (like "explain it in Turkish language for 14 year old", or "make a tweet out of this text, add emoji and excitement").

Security notes:
üîí API key stored in your browser and used for OpenAI open API calls only.
üîí The selected text is sent directly to the OpenAI API and is not stored anywhere. The OpenAI response is the summary itself; it is displayed on your screen and is not stored anywhere.

Feedback, questions, comments are highly appreciated: info@textaigist.online
